title: Fuzzy Logic-Based Language Learning Task Sequencing Design

context.additional_context: Need to provide flexible learning pathways for improving workplace language proficiency for employees.

learning_goals: Learners can utilize situation-specific workplace language expressions with at least 80% accuracy.
Learners design personalized learning pathways through a fuzzy logic-based task sequencing system.
Learners demonstrate their ability to apply language in real-world work environments through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
